Uses of Class
lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.AbstractHardware

    • Uses of AbstractHardware in lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator

      Subclasses of AbstractHardware in lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CardSlotSimulator
      Represents a device that accepts and reads magnetic stripe cards (credit cards, debit cards, etc.).
      class  CoinRackSimulator
      Represents a device that stores coins of a particular denomination to dispense them as change.
      class  CoinReceptacleSimulator
      A temporary storage device for coins.
      class  CoinSlotSimulator
      Represents a simple coin slot device that has two output channels, one to a storage container and one to a coin return device.
      class  DeliveryChuteSimulator
      Represents a simple delivery chute device.
      class  DisplaySimulator
      A simple device that displays a string.
      class  IndicatorLightSimulator
      A simple device that can be on or off as an indication to users.
      class  LockSimulator
      A simple lock device to prevent or to permit the interior of the vending machine to be accessed.
      class  PopCanRackSimulator
      Represents a storage rack for pop cans within the vending machine.
      class  SelectionButtonSimulator
      Represents a simple push button on the vending machine.
      Methods in lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator with parameters of type AbstractHardware 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AbstractHardwareListener.disabled(AbstractHardware<AbstractHardwareListener> hardware)
      Announces that the indicated hardware has been disabled.
      void AbstractHardwareListener.enabled(AbstractHardware<AbstractHardwareListener> hardware)
      Announces that the indicated hardware has been enabled.
